title: Fallout 3 - Game of the Year Edition
notes: You have to disable Multimonitor-Setups. If the Game starts with only one Monitor it works :] Also needed to manually add the xlive.dll in the installation Folder.

title: Fallout 3 - Game of the Year Edition
notes:
Runs if xlive.dll is installed, I installed it by downloading http://download.gfwl.xboxlive.com/content/gfwl-public/redists/production/xliveredist.msi
then running `/tmp/proton_run msiexec /i /path/to/xliveredist.msi`

title: Fallout 3 - Game of the Year Edition
notes: xlive.dll was necessary, taken from C:\Windows\SysWOW64\xlive.dll from a native win7 system.  Game crashed after exit from vault 101, right as first level up window popped.  Reloading from save game resulted in black textures but level up succeeded. Successive reloads brought textures back.  Upon exiting into the wastes, any time you point your character in the direction of Vault 101, the entire texturing changes, your hands/weapon disappear, as does the green tint.  First time I attempt to buy from Crow, game crashes.

title: Fallout 3 Game of the Year Edition
notes: Copied Xlive.dll to the game folder before ever starting. The game runs fine, but sometimes it will randomly freeze or the window will disappear when tabbing out.

title: Fallout 3 GOTY
notes:
- Requires quartz and lcodecx to be installed with protontricks `protontricks 22370 l3codecx quartz`
- Requires xliveredist.msi to be installed with `/tmp/proton_run msiexec /i ${ABSOLUTE_PATH}/xliveredist.msi`
- Requires that all water effects are disabled to avoid serious rendering glitches

title: Fallout 3: Game of the Year Edition

notes: Sometimes won't start, radio station won't play on pip-boy, but will play on external radio.
title: Fallout 3: Game of the Year Edition

notes: Had to obtain a copy of xlive.dll, found some random copy from one of those random dll download sites as I have no Windows machines available. Just place the xlive.dll file into ~/.steam/steam/steamapps/common/Fallout 3 goty/ and you are good to go.
title: Fallout 3: Game of the Year Edition

notes: First I did install xact via winetricks, but the black screen still appears. Not sure if xact is really necessary. So, I tried to install the xliveredist.msi, and copy paste the xlive.dll to the game install root. Then the game looks to run fine in windowed mode.
title: Fallout 3: Game of the Year Edition

notes: Copied xlive.dll to solve the black screen. Edited ...\Documents\My Games\Fallout3\FALLOUT.ini and changed bUseThreadedAI=0 to 1 and added iNumHWThreads=2 line to solve random crashes. Alt-tabbing to another window makes the game crash.
title: Fallout 3: Game of the Year Edition

notes: Runs fine after adding xlive.dll and doing the aforementioned changes in FALLOUT.ini. Make sure you edit the correct ini-file, search for it in %steam%/steamapps/compatdata/22370/pfx/.../My Games/Fallout3

title: Fallout 3: Game of the Year Edition

notes: Runs fine at first, then it drags down to 9fps as soon as I enter the Atrium. Exiting the vault does not fix this, or restarting the game.
title: Fallout 3: Game of the Year Edition

notes: Steps: Install from Steam. Do not open the game. Paste xlive.dll into /home/user/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/common/Fallout 3 goty. Leave the predefined options of the game.
